alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Cache County through 715 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lewiston to near Trenton. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cache, Smithfield, Lewiston, Trenton, Peter, Benson, Hyde Park, Richmond, Newton, Amalga, Cornish and Beaver Mountain. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 472 and 487. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
